title: Best of The Program | Guests: Asra Nomani & David Harsanyi | 10/27/21
description:
Glenn reads an article on why we should be more optimistic that America is on the right track. Asra Nomani, vice president of Parents Defending Education, joins to share the latest on the war against the school boards. David Harsanyi, author of "Eurotrash," joins to discuss why America must reject European policies, not implement them.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
